Irving S. Olds collection of naval and other historical prints and related papers

Print No. 208. Lithograph: "No. 1 … This representation of H.M.S. Shannon, commencing the Battle with the American Frigate Chesapeake, on the 1st. June 1813, is Dedicated by his obliged and most grateful Servant, R.H. King."

Print No. 208. Lithograph: "No. 1 … This representation of H.M.S. Shannon, commencing the Battle with the American Frigate Chesapeake, on the 1st. June 1813, is Dedicated by his obliged and most grateful Servant, R.H. King."
Painted by J.C. Schetky. On Stone by L. Haghe. Designed by Captn. R.H. King, R.N. Published by Smith, Elder & Co., London. One of a set of four prints. Colored by hand.
Irving S. Olds collection of naval and other historical prints and related papers
